title: How to Make Bananas Ripen Faster
description:
Learn how to make bananas ripen faster with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Bananas-Ripen-Faster

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make bananas ripen faster store them in a paper bag overnight which will trap the ethylene gas that makes them ripen you can also put other fruit in the bag with the bananas like an apple pear or avocado to speed up the ripening process to make them ripen even faster store them in a warm location like next to an oven or on top of a fridge if you want really ripe bananas for baking bake them in the oven for 20 to 30 minutes at 300 degrees Fahrenheitto make bananas ripen faster store them in a paper bag overnight which will trap the ethylene gas that makes them ripen you can also put other fruit in the bag with the bananas like an apple pear or avocado to speed up the ripening process to make them ripen even faster store them in a warm location like next to an oven or on top of a fridge if you want really ripe bananas for baking bake them in the oven for 20 to 30 minutes at 300 degrees Fahrenheit

title: How to Make Barbecue Sauce
description:
You just need 5 minutes to make your own, classic BBQ sauce. This quick video will give you some tips on how to make barbecue sauce at home!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Barbecue-Sauce

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make barbecue sauce start by combining the following ingredients into a saucepan 1/2 cup or 115 grams of ketchup 3 tablespoons of water 1 tablespoon of maple syrup 2 teaspoons of Dijon mustard 1 teaspoon of Worcestershire sauce 1 teaspoon of butter 1/2 teaspoon of paprika 1/2 teaspoon of onion powder 1/2 teaspoon of garlic powder and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper then heat the sauce on medium heat stirring continuously once the sauce starts to bubble let it simmer for 3 to 5 minutes before serving or storing it in the refrigeratorto make barbecue sauce start by combining the following ingredients into a saucepan 1/2 cup or 115 grams of ketchup 3 tablespoons of water 1 tablespoon of maple syrup 2 teaspoons of Dijon mustard 1 teaspoon of Worcestershire sauce 1 teaspoon of butter 1/2 teaspoon of paprika 1/2 teaspoon of onion powder 1/2 teaspoon of garlic powder and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper then heat the sauce on medium heat stirring continuously once the sauce starts to bubble let it simmer for 3 to 5 minutes before serving or storing it in the refrigerator

title: How to Make Bread and Butter Pudding
description:
Learn How to Make Bread and Butter Pudding with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Bread-and-Butter-Pudding

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make bread and butter pudding first pre-heat your oven to 180 degrees Celsius 355 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a baking dish with softened butter then cut 8 slices of bread in half diagonally and cut each half in half again spread softened butter onto one side of each piece place 8 of the pieces into the baking dish with the buttered size facing up next sprinkle a handful of sultanas or raisins over the bread followed by a liberal amount of cinnamon this completes the first layer repeat the process to add more layers until you've run out of pieces of bread then set aside to make the custard first add 1 and 1/2 cups 350 milliliters each of whole milk and double cream to a small saucepan place the saucepan on the stove and heat on low until it starts to seem while that's heating up crack 2 eggs into a bowl and add 2 tablespoons 25 grams of granulated sugar whisk the eggs and sugar until fully blended finish the custard by slowly pouring the milk and cream mixture into the egg and sugar mixture then whisking everything together put a strainer inside of another bowl and pour the custard into it to catch any bits of cooked egg which you can discard now pour the custard evenly over the bread in the baking dish sprinkle some nutmeg cinnamon and a bit more sugar over the top of the bread and custard let the bread sit for 30 minutes to soak up the custard then bake it in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes you'll know it's done when the bread pudding has a golden-brown color and the custard has thickenedto make bread and butter pudding first pre-heat your oven to 180 degrees Celsius 355 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a baking dish with softened butter then cut 8 slices of bread in half diagonally and cut each half in half again spread softened butter onto one side of each piece place 8 of the pieces into the baking dish with the buttered size facing up next sprinkle a handful of sultanas or raisins over the bread followed by a liberal amount of cinnamon this completes the first layer repeat the process to add more layers until you've run out of pieces of bread then set aside to make the custard first add 1 and 1/2 cups 350 milliliters each of whole milk and double cream to a small saucepan place the saucepan on the stove and heat on low until it starts to seem while that's heating up crack 2 eggs into a bowl and add 2 tablespoons 25 grams of granulated sugar whisk the eggs and sugar until fully blended finish the custard by slowly pouring the milk and cream mixture into the egg and sugar mixture then whisking everything together put a strainer inside of another bowl and pour the custard into it to catch any bits of cooked egg which you can discard now pour the custard evenly over the bread in the baking dish sprinkle some nutmeg cinnamon and a bit more sugar over the top of the bread and custard let the bread sit for 30 minutes to soak up the custard then bake it in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes you'll know it's done when the bread pudding has a golden-brown color and the custard has thickened

title: How to Make Brownies
description:
This quick video will give you some tips on #howto make delicious brownies!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Brownies

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: so make simple brownies first gather your materials preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a 9x9 baking tray that's about an inch deep with a bit of butter or even a butter wrapper then line the pan with parchment paper or aluminum foil in a small pan over a low heat melt four tablespoons of butter if your butter is at room temperature it'll melt faster otherwise it should only take a minute or two while the butter is melting mix one cup of castor sugar and two eggs in a separate Bowl until they're completely mixed you can use a wooden spoon a whisk or even an electric mixer now pour your melted butter into the sugar and egg mixture mix it together until you get a creamy light yellow mixture in another bowl mix a quarter cup of flour and three tablespoons of cocoa powder sift the cocoa mixture into the egg mixture a little at a time sifting allows air to get into the batter making for extra fluffy brownies next mix in three quarter cups of chocolate chips you can use regular chocolate chips or mini ones for more chocolate in every bite if you're feeling adventurous you can even go for white chocolate chips finally pour the mixture into the greased pan and use a flat plastic spatula or a knife to even it out try to spread it as evenly as you can so the brownies are all the same thickness put the tray on the middle rack of your oven and bake for 30 minutes after 25 minutes check on the brownies to see they're done when they are take them out and let them cool for at least 5 minutes letting the brownies cool lets them harden up so they're easier to cut cut the brownies to your preferred size and sprinkle them with confectioners sugar for an extra sweet taste [Applause] [Music]so make simple brownies first gather your materials preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a 9x9 baking tray that's about an inch deep with a bit of butter or even a butter wrapper then line the pan with parchment paper or aluminum foil in a small pan over a low heat melt four tablespoons of butter if your butter is at room temperature it'll melt faster otherwise it should only take a minute or two while the butter is melting mix one cup of castor sugar and two eggs in a separate Bowl until they're completely mixed you can use a wooden spoon a whisk or even an electric mixer now pour your melted butter into the sugar and egg mixture mix it together until you get a creamy light yellow mixture in another bowl mix a quarter cup of flour and three tablespoons of cocoa powder sift the cocoa mixture into the egg mixture a little at a time sifting allows air to get into the batter making for extra fluffy brownies next mix in three quarter cups of chocolate chips you can use regular chocolate chips or mini ones for more chocolate in every bite if you're feeling adventurous you can even go for white chocolate chips finally pour the mixture into the greased pan and use a flat plastic spatula or a knife to even it out try to spread it as evenly as you can so the brownies are all the same thickness put the tray on the middle rack of your oven and bake for 30 minutes after 25 minutes check on the brownies to see they're done when they are take them out and let them cool for at least 5 minutes letting the brownies cool lets them harden up so they're easier to cut cut the brownies to your preferred size and sprinkle them with confectioners sugar for an extra sweet taste [Applause] [Music]

title: How to Make Buttermilk from Milk
description:
Did you know you can make buttermilk from the milk in your fridge? This video shows you #howto make buttermilk at home!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Buttermilk-from-Milk

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make buttermilk from milk start by mixing one cup 240 milliliters of milk with one tablespoon of white vinegar or lemon juice then stir the mixture and let it sit for five to 10 minutes or until it kernels once the milk has curdled add it to your recipe in place of buttermilk and you're finishedto make buttermilk from milk start by mixing one cup 240 milliliters of milk with one tablespoon of white vinegar or lemon juice then stir the mixture and let it sit for five to 10 minutes or until it kernels once the milk has curdled add it to your recipe in place of buttermilk and you're finished

title: How to Make Candied Pecans
description:
Learn how to make candied pecans with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Candied-Pecans

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make quick candied pecans mix sugar and salt in a bowl melt butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat then add the pecans and coat them add the sugar mixture and stir for five to seven minutes until the nuts are golden brown and let cool on wax paper for a healthier version toast the pecans in a saucepan on the stove for two to three minutes while mixing brown sugar water vanilla and salt in a bowl remove the pecans and cook the mixture on high for 5 minutes add the pecans back in stir for a few seconds until they're coated then remove and let coolto make quick candied pecans mix sugar and salt in a bowl melt butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat then add the pecans and coat them add the sugar mixture and stir for five to seven minutes until the nuts are golden brown and let cool on wax paper for a healthier version toast the pecans in a saucepan on the stove for two to three minutes while mixing brown sugar water vanilla and salt in a bowl remove the pecans and cook the mixture on high for 5 minutes add the pecans back in stir for a few seconds until they're coated then remove and let cool

title: How to Make Caramelized Onions
description:
Learn how to make caramelized onions with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Caramelized-Onions

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make caramelized onions start by removing the onion skin and cutting the onions into thin slivers for every two and a half pounds of onions add three tablespoons of butter and two tablespoons of olive oil to a large skillet heat the skillet for two to three minutes then add the onions to the skillet and season them with salt and pepper saute the onions for five minutes next add two teaspoons of sugar and cook the onions for an additional 20 minutes stirring frequently to prevent burning you'll know they're done when the onions are soft and brown serve immediately and enjoy as always be sure to exercise caution when handling a knife to avoid injuryto make caramelized onions start by removing the onion skin and cutting the onions into thin slivers for every two and a half pounds of onions add three tablespoons of butter and two tablespoons of olive oil to a large skillet heat the skillet for two to three minutes then add the onions to the skillet and season them with salt and pepper saute the onions for five minutes next add two teaspoons of sugar and cook the onions for an additional 20 minutes stirring frequently to prevent burning you'll know they're done when the onions are soft and brown serve immediately and enjoy as always be sure to exercise caution when handling a knife to avoid injury

title: IFTAR Recipe in 1 Minute - Easy Carrot Halwa
description: Please subscribe to the channel and I appreciate your time to leave a comment. This recipe video shows how to make carrot halwa or gajor halwa. It is easy but very delicious. It is a popular Indian and Pakistani desserts or sweets. It is a very healthy recipe for both  Iftar and Eid in the month of Ramadan
subtitles: so let me release you what I'm using for carrot halwa as a as you can see I have carrot chopped carrot here two spoonful of a butter raising two kinds of nuts and bay leaf cardamom and cinnamon and 2 tablespoon full of sugar I have here sugar milk but you can also use con little bit of condensed milk as really if you want then I am boiling carrots in a very little water so I don't have to drain any nutrients with the water then after that I am blending all the carrots I have then I'm melting the butter this like to develop spoonful of butter now the last thing you do is to add the curry paste and the milk and keep stirring it well until it gets thick when it cools down you can cut it like cakes and serve it cool Thank You viewers thank you for watching please subscribe for moreso let me release you what I'm using for carrot halwa as a as you can see I have carrot chopped carrot here two spoonful of a butter raising two kinds of nuts and bay leaf cardamom and cinnamon and 2 tablespoon full of sugar I have here sugar milk but you can also use con little bit of condensed milk as really if you want then I am boiling carrots in a very little water so I don't have to drain any nutrients with the water then after that I am blending all the carrots I have then I'm melting the butter this like to develop spoonful of butter now the last thing you do is to add the curry paste and the milk and keep stirring it well until it gets thick when it cools down you can cut it like cakes and serve it cool Thank You viewers thank you for watching please subscribe for more

subtitles: the easiest way to make a hearty chicken soup is to place your cut and washed chicken breast in a pot with salt bay leaves and water let simmer for two and a quarter hours then add vegetables and cook for 45 more minutes strain the broth into a separate bowl so you can remove the chicken meat from the bone then pour the broth chicken and vegetables back into the pot to serve for veggie suggestions and other tasty add-ons keep readingthe easiest way to make a hearty chicken soup is to place your cut and washed chicken breast in a pot with salt bay leaves and water let simmer for two and a quarter hours then add vegetables and cook for 45 more minutes strain the broth into a separate bowl so you can remove the chicken meat from the bone then pour the broth chicken and vegetables back into the pot to serve for veggie suggestions and other tasty add-ons keep reading

title: How to Make Chocolate
description:
Learn How to Make Chocolate with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Chocolate

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make chocolate first melt half a cup 110 grams of coconut oil in a saucepan over low heat then add half a cup 65 grams of cocoa powder and two tablespoons 42 grams of honey to the saucepan and mix everything together for two minutes next turn the heat off and mix in half a teaspoon two grams of vanilla extract add a pinch of cinnamon cardamom or salt if you like to give your chocolate some spice then stir everything together for one more minute finally pour the chocolate into muffin tin liners or silicone molds and stored in the refrigerator until it turns solidto make chocolate first melt half a cup 110 grams of coconut oil in a saucepan over low heat then add half a cup 65 grams of cocoa powder and two tablespoons 42 grams of honey to the saucepan and mix everything together for two minutes next turn the heat off and mix in half a teaspoon two grams of vanilla extract add a pinch of cinnamon cardamom or salt if you like to give your chocolate some spice then stir everything together for one more minute finally pour the chocolate into muffin tin liners or silicone molds and stored in the refrigerator until it turns solid

subtitles: before making brownies preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a large pan or casserole dish then prepare the chocolate by melting 1/2 cup of butter with 1 cup of semi-sweet chocolate chips in a medium-sized saucepan mix the melted chocolate with 1.75 cups of sugar 2 eggs 1/3 cup of flour 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder and 1 teaspoon of salt finally pour the batter into the greased pan and bake for 30 minutesbefore making brownies preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a large pan or casserole dish then prepare the chocolate by melting 1/2 cup of butter with 1 cup of semi-sweet chocolate chips in a medium-sized saucepan mix the melted chocolate with 1.75 cups of sugar 2 eggs 1/3 cup of flour 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder and 1 teaspoon of salt finally pour the batter into the greased pan and bake for 30 minutes

title: How to Make Corn Tortillas
description:

subtitles: to make corn tortillas mix the dough and let sit for 30 minutes then break it into 12 small balls next place a dough ball in between two pieces of wax paper and roll it into a thin flat circle with a rolling pin heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat put a tortilla in the skillet and cook the first side for 30 to 60 seconds flip the tortilla and let it cook for 60 seconds then wrap the cooked tortilla in a clean towel to keep it warm while you make the next oneto make corn tortillas mix the dough and let sit for 30 minutes then break it into 12 small balls next place a dough ball in between two pieces of wax paper and roll it into a thin flat circle with a rolling pin heat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat put a tortilla in the skillet and cook the first side for 30 to 60 seconds flip the tortilla and let it cook for 60 seconds then wrap the cooked tortilla in a clean towel to keep it warm while you make the next one
